title: someone hacked to me and bought me champions and i dont have refun what to do
body: someone hacked to me and bought me champions and i dont have refun what to do please help me

replies.body:
The first thing you should do is ensure you've secured your account with [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) After completing that, we'll need you to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account specialists can take a look at what happened when your account was compromised. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
